message: Charlie Hebdo never claimed to be a tasteful publication. It has better things to do. It has been a loud, raucous voice for freedom --from religious bigotry, and hypocrisy of all kinds. That's why they were attacked by religious bigots. That's why PEN is right to give them an award -- for guts, for making use of freedom of speech instead of self censorship.
